dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh oh...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: È tutto a posto?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: No! Ci sono delle strane interferenze...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Qualcosa non va! Stiamo per schiantarci!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Abbandonare la nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Ma che diavolo sta succedendo?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Fiuuu... Che paura!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: Beh, se non altro siamo fuggiti tutti, vero?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: C'è nessuno?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Ma... perché la nave ha teletrasportato qui soltanto me?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Spero che gli altri se la siano cavata...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: Violet! Tutto bene?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Che gioia!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Il teletrasporto della nave ha avuto una terribile avaria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Temo che abbia sballottato tutti chissà dove!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Io sono sulla nave... È danneggiata, ma è ancora tutta intera!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Lei dov'è, Capitano?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: In una specie di stazione spaziale... Sembra molto moderna...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Ci sono delle strane interferenze in questa dimensione...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Le trasmetto subito le coordinate della nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Io non posso riportarla qui, ma...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Se trovasse un teletrasporto, potrebbe raggiungermi lei!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Vedrò di trovarne uno!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Buona fortuna, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Continuerò a cercare il resto dell'equipaggio...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Chissà cos'è!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Dubito che mi serva, ma meglio portarlo alla nave per studiarlo...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Oh! Un altro di quegli aggeggi luccicanti!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Dubito che mi serva, ma meglio portarlo alla nave per studiarlo...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Un teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Con questo posso tornare alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Dottoressa... Ha idea di cosa possa aver causato lo schianto?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Qui c'è un qualche bizzarro segnale che interferisce con la nostra strumentazione...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ha annullato la posizione quantica della nave, facendoci collassare in questa dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Ma possiamo riparare la nave e andarcene...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: Se ritroviamo il resto dell'equipaggio.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: Non sappiamo davvero niente di questo posto...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: I nostri amici potrebbero essere ovunque... Smarriti, o in pericolo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Possono teletrasportarsi qui?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: No, se prima non trovano un modo per comunicare con noi!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Noi non possiamo rilevare il loro segnale e loro non possono raggiungerci senza sapere dove siamo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: E allora che facciamo?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Li cerchiamo! Esploriamo questa dimensione e proviamo a capire dove sono finiti.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: Ok! Da dove cominciamo?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Beh, io sto provando a cercarli con gli scanner della nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Non ho trovato loro, ma ho trovato qualcos'altro...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Stando agli scanner, in questi punti ci sono dei pattern energetici molto intensi.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: Sembrano teletrasporti... E quelli sono sempre vicini a qualcosa d'importante...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: È un buon punto di partenza.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Andrò a vedere cosa c'è!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Se ha bisogno d'aiuto, io sono qui!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Se ha bisogno d'aiuto, io sono qui!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Non so se mi sento all'altezza del compito, dottoressa.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Da dove comincio?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Ricordi: può premere INVIO per controllare la sua posizione sulla mappa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Cerchi le zone in cui potrebbe trovarsi il resto dell'equipaggio...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Se si perde, può tornare alla nave da qualsiasi teletrasporto.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: E non si preoccupi! Troveremo tutti!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Andrà tutto per il meglio!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Sta bene, Capitano?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Temo per la sorte di Victoria, dottoressa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Temo per la sorte di Vitellary, dottoressa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Temo per la sorte di Verdigris, dottoressa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Temo per la sorte di Vermilion, dottoressa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Temo per la sua sorte, dottoressa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Oh... Beh, non si preoccupi. Vedrà che spunterà fuori!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Ecco, tenga un lecca lecca!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Questo mi sembra un buon posto dove conservare quello che trovo...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria adora studiare le cose interessanti che troviamo nelle nostre avventure!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Questo mi sembra un buon posto dove conservare quegli aggeggi luccicanti.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria adora studiare le cose interessanti che troviamo nelle nostre avventure!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Spero che stia bene...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Ero preoccupatissimo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Capo Verdigris! Che gioia vederla!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Ho provato ad andarmene, ma continuo a tornare al punto di partenza...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Sono qui per teletrasportarla alla nave. Io arrivo da lì.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: Gli altri stanno bene? Violet sta...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Sta bene, sì. È già sulla nave!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Oh! Perfetto. Allora andiamo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Oh, no, Capitano! È bloccato qui anche lei?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Va tutto bene, sono qui per salvarla!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Lasci che le spieghi tutto...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Cosa? Non ho capito niente!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Oh, beh... Non si preoccupi.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Mi segua! Andrà tutto bene!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Sniff... Dice davvero?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Allora ok!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ma che gioia vederla! Temevo di essere l'unico superstite!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion! Sta bene! Ne ero sicuro!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Allora, qual è la situazione?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Capisco. Beh, allora è meglio tornare.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Nella stanza accanto c'è un teletrasporto.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Ah, Viridian! Se l'è cavata anche lei!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: È bello vedere che sta bene, professore!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: La nave è a posto?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: È molto danneggiata, ma Violet la sta già riparando.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: Il suo aiuto ci farebbe molto comodo...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Ah, ma certo!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Quando ci siamo schiantati, l'interferenza in questa dimensione ha impedito alla nave di trovare un teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: E siamo tutti andati a finire in luoghi diversi!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: Uhm... Ok, capisco!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Allora torniamo alla nave, forza!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Dopo di lei, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Sta bene?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Sto bene, ma... questa... Questa non è la nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Dove siamo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Qualcosa è andato storto... Dobbiamo tornare indietro!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Mi segua! L'aiuterò io!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Mi prometta che non se ne andrà senza di me!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Lo prometto! Non si preoccupi!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Tutto bene laggiù, dottoressa?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Voglio tornare a casa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Ma dove siamo? Come siamo arrivati qui?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Secondo Violet, l'interferenza nella dimensione in cui ci siamo schiantati ha causato problemi ai teletrasporti...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Qualcosa dev'essere andato storto...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ma se troviamo un altro teletrasporto, possiamo comunque tornare alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Capitano, Capitano! Mi aspetti!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Non mi lasci indietro! Scusi se sono un peso!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Ho paura!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Oh... Non abbia paura, Victoria, ci sono io a proteggerla!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Non usciremo mai da qui, non è vero?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: Non... Non lo so...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Non so dove siamo, né come usciremo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Non ritroveremo più la via di casa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Suvvia... Non sia così pessimista.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Siamo quasi arrivati, me lo sento!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Deve pur esserci un teletrasporto nei paraggi!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Spero proprio che lei abbia ragione, Capitano...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Aveva ragione! Un teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Fiuuu! Per un attimo mi aveva fatto preoccupare, sa? Pensavo che non ne avremmo mai trovato uno.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Eh? Davvero?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: Lasci perdere... Ora torniamo alla nave.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Eh? Ma questa non è la nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Ma cosa succede?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Non... Non lo so!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Dove siamo?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Oh oh... Bel guaio... Dev'esserci stato un problema col teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: Ok... Niente panico!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Cerchiamo un altro teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Andiamo di qua!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Dopo di lei, Capitano!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Quindi Violet è tornata sulla nave? Davvero sta bene?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Sta bene! Mi ha aiutato lei a tornare indietro!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Fiuuu! Ero preoccupato per lei.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Capitano, ho un segreto...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Violet mi piace molto!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: Ah, davvero?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Mi prometta che non glielo dirà!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Ehilà, ci rivediamo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Sta bene?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Credo di sì! Spero davvero che riusciremo a tornare alla nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Dicevo di Violet...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Uhm... Sì?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Ha qualche consiglio?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: L'importante è... essere sé stessi!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Grazie, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: Allora, pensa che riuscirà a riparare la nave?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Beh, dipende dal guasto... Ma credo di sì!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Non è difficile, davvero. La struttura del motore a curvatura è molto basilare. Se riusciamo a ripararlo, non avremo problemi a tornare a casa.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Oh! Bene!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Finalmente! Un teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Iniziavo a temere che non ne avremmo più trovato uno...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Torniamo alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Wow! Ma dove siamo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Qualcosa... non quadra. Dev'essersi guastato il teletrasporto!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Oh, beh... Ce ne occuperemo una volta tornati alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Andiamo a esplorare!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Mi segua!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Agli ordini, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Mi dica, Viridian... Di preciso, cosa ha causato il nostro incidente?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Oh, non saprei proprio. Una specie di interferenza...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: Roba di scienza, comunque. Non è proprio il mio campo.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ah! Beh, pensa che riusciremo a riparare la nave e tornare a casa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Certo! Andrà tutto bene!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Ci rivediamo! Tutto bene?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Credo di sì... Ma vorrei davvero tornare alla nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Ce la faremo! Dobbiamo solo trovare un teletrasporto qui attorno!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Siamo arrivati?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Ci stiamo avvicinando, credo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Ma lei... ha idea di dove siamo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Non sembra la stessa dimensione in cui siamo precipitati...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Non saprei... Ma deve pur esserci un teletrasporto qui vicino...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Ci siamo!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Visto? Gliel'avevo detto! Si torna alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Oooh! Molto interessante...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Capitano! È già stato qui?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Cosa? Dove siamo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Qualcosa deve aver deviato la trasmissione del teletrasporto! Siamo in un posto nuovo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dobbiamo trovare un teletrasporto e tornare alla nave...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Mi segua!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Non la perdo di vista, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: Lei ci capisce qualcosa, professore?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Probabilmente questa dimensione è collegata all'interferenza che ci ha fatto precipitare!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Forse qui ne troveremo la causa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Oh, wow! Davvero?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Beh, è un'ipotesi. Per poter fare dei veri e propri test, devo prima tornare alla nave...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Oh, e quello cos'era?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: Di che parla?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: Di... quell'aggeggio con la C! A cosa servirà?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Ehm... Non so proprio come rispondere.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Credo sia meglio non badarci affatto.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: Sarà il caso di portarlo alla nave per studiarlo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: No, sul serio, meglio non pensarci... Forza, muoviamoci!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Sa, questa dimensione ha qualcosa di molto strano...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Ah sì?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Un normale teletrasporto non dovrebbe permetterci di viaggiare tra le dimensioni...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Forse questa non è affatto una dimensione...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: E se fosse una sorta di dimensione polare, creata artificialmente per qualche motivo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Non vedo l'ora di tornare alla nave. Ho tanti di quei test da effettuare!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Chissà se in questa dimensione c'è altro da esplorare.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Forse sì... Ma per ora è meglio se ci limitiamo a trovare il resto dell'equipaggio.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Torniamo alla nave!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh oh...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no! Di nuovo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Victoria? Ma dov'è?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Tenga duro! La salverò io!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdigris? Ma dov'è?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Tenga duro! La salverò io!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermilion? Ma dov'è?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Tenga duro! La salverò io!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitellary? Ma dov'è?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Tenga duro! La salverò io!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Mi sta venendo la nausea...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Che giramento di testa...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Che sollievo vedere che sta bene!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Che giramento di testa...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Ancora! Facciamolo ancora!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Che giramento di testa...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: È stato interessante, no?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Che giramento di testa...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Spero che Verdigris stia bene.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Se lei riuscisse a trovarlo, ci sarebbe di enorme aiuto nel riparare la nave!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: Il Capo Verdigris è coraggioso e intelligentissimo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Bentornato, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Penso che Victoria sia contenta di essere tornata sulla nave.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: L'avventura non fa proprio per lei. Le fa venire nostalgia di casa!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion si è messo in contatto per farci un saluto!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare il resto dell'equipaggio!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare Vitellary!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare Verdigris!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare Vermilion!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Non vede l'ora di darle una mano a trovare la strada giusta!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Ha trovato Verdigris!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Grazie mille!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Che gioia, il prof. Vitellary sta bene!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Mi ha fatto un sacco di domande su questa dimensione.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Si è già tuffato a capofitto nelle sue ricerche!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dottoressa, quando ci siamo teletrasportati è successa una cosa strana...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ci siamo persi in un'altra dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Forse... quella dimensione è collegata all'interferenza che ci ha fatto precipitare...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Vedrò di capirci qualcosa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Dottoressa, dottoressa! È successo di nuovo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: Il teletrasporto ci ha catapultato in quella strana dimensione...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Uhm, qui sta succedendo qualcosa di bizzarro...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se solo riuscissimo a trovare l'origine dell'interferenza!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dottoressa, quando ci teletrasportiamo alla nave succede sempre una cosa strana...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Veniamo catapultati in un'altra dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Forse... quella dimensione è collegata all'interferenza che ci ha fatto precipitare...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Uhm, qui sta succedendo qualcosa di bizzarro...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Se solo riuscissimo a trovare l'origine dell'interferenza!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Ehi, Capitano! Ora che la fonte dell'interferenza è disattivata, possiamo teletrasportare immediatamente tutti sulla nave, se necessario!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Per tornare sulla nave basterà selezionare la nuova opzione NAVE nel menu!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Io sono un ingegnere!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Credo di poter rimettere in moto questa nave, ma mi ci vorrà un po'...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: Sbaglio o Victoria aveva parlato di un laboratorio? Chissà se ha trovato qualcosa, laggiù...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: È tornato Vermilion! Alé!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: Il Professore vuole che gli spieghi molte cose su questa dimensione...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Ma non sappiamo ancora granché.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Finché non scopriamo cosa causa quell'interferenza, siamo bloccati qui.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Per fortuna Violet sta bene!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: L'altra dimensione in cui siamo finiti dev'essere in qualche modo legata a questa...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: L'antenna è rotta! Sarà un incubo da riparare...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Al momento dello schianto, pare che ci siamo materializzati dentro alla dura roccia!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Uhm. Sarà difficile separarsene...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: La nave è sistemata, possiamo andarcene quando volete!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Nessun problema, signore!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Troverò una via d'uscita!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Spero che Victoria stia bene...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Non è un'amante delle sorprese...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Non ho idea di come rimettere in volo questa nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: Il Capo Verdigris saprebbe cosa fare...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Chissà perché la nave è precipitata qui?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: Se solo avessimo il Prof qui con noi! Lui lo scoprirebbe di sicuro!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: Che bello essere di nuovo qui!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Non vedo l'ora d'aiutarla a trovare il resto dell'equipaggio!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Proprio come ai vecchi tempi, dico bene Capitano?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: È una gioia riavere Victoria con noi.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Sembra davvero felice di poter tornare al suo laboratorio!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Se non sbaglio, Verdigris sta lavorando all'esterno della nave!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Ha trovato il prof. Vitellary! Fantastico!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Sistemeremo questa faccenda delle interferenze in quattro e quattr'otto!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Quell'altra dimensione era bella strana, vero?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Chissà perché il teletrasporto ci ha spediti laggiù?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Salve Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Passare di qua mi pare un filo rischioso...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: La aiuto io!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Salve Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Molto interessante: qui attorno rilevo lo stesso tipo di distorsione di quando sono atterrato!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Dobbiamo essere vicini a un passeggero della nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Che dimensione emozionante! Dico bene?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Chissà cosa troveremo?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: Ci sono tracce del prof. Vitellary?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Ancora niente, temo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Spero che stia bene...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Grazie davvero per avermi salvato, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: È una gioia essere ancora qui!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Quel laboratorio è buio e spaventoso! Non mi piace affatto...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: Vitellary è tornato! Sapevo che l'avremmo trovato!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Cioè... in realtà temevo davvero di no...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: O che gli sarebbe capitato qualcosa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Dottoressa Victoria? Sta bene!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Oh, chiedo scusa! Per un attimo ho immaginato il peggio...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Grazie, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Ha trovato Vermilion! Meraviglioso!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Vorrei che non fosse così avventato!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Si caccerà in un mare di guai...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: Verdigris sta bene! Violet farà salti di gioia!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Sono felice!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Ma ero in pensiero...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Perché il teletrasporto ci ha mandati in quella dimensione da incubo?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: Che è successo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Non lo so, Dottoressa...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Perché?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Salve Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Vogliamo provare a recuperare gli aggeggi luccicanti rimasti?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Ehi Capitano, c'era questo al laboratorio...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: A cosa potrebbe servire?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Mi spiace, non ne ho idea!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Comunque, sembrano cose importanti...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Forse accadrà qualcosa se li troviamo tutti?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Guardi cosa ho scoperto!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Quegli aggeggi luccicanti emanavano una strana energia!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Perciò l'ho analizzata...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Guardi cosa ho scoperto!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: C'era questo al laboratorio...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Sembrava emanare una strana energia...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Perciò l'ho analizzata...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: E lo scanner della nave ne ha individuati degli altri!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Se riesce, potrebbe valere la pena recuperarli!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Ma non corra rischi inutili, mi raccomando!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ma ha già raccolto tutti quelli di questa dimensione, vedo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Oh? Davvero?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Ben fatto davvero! Chissà che fatica!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: E sono collegati. Fanno tutti parte di qualcosa di più grande!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Oh? Davvero?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Già! Rilevo venti variazioni del profilo energetico di base...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Un attimo...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: Questo significa che li ha trovati tutti?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Sto scoprendo cose affascinanti, Capitano!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Non abbiamo mai visto una dimensione come questa, Capitano.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: C'è qualcosa di strano qui...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Capitano, ha notato come questa dimensione sembri ripetersi ciclicamente?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Già, è strano...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Pare che questa dimensione sia instabile quanto la nostra!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Spero solo che non sia colpa nostra...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Cosa? Potremmo essere noi i responsabili?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: No no... Sarebbe molto, molto improbabile...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Ipotizzo che chiunque vivesse qui conducesse esperimenti per fermare il collasso della dimensione.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Questo spiegherebbe la ciclicità dei margini...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Ehi, forse è quella la causa delle interferenze?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Chissà dove sono finiti tutti gli abitanti?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Per me non è un caso che il teletrasporto andasse verso quella dimensione...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Laggiù c'è qualcosa. Forse è quello che crea le interferenze che ci bloccano qui...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: È un sollievo che Verdigris stia bene.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Ora che possiamo riparare la nave, sarà molto più facile trovare un modo per andarcene!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ha trovato la Dottoressa Victoria? Ottimo!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Ho un sacco di domande da farle!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: Vermilion dice che era intrappolata in una sorta di tunnel?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Già, continuava senza fine...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Interessante... Chissà perché l'hanno costruito!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: Che gioia essere di nuovo qui!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Ho tanto di quel lavoro da recuperare...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Suppongo che sia pericoloso attardarsi ora che la dimensione sta collassando..

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: Ma questo posto è straordinariamente interessante!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Forse è qui che troveremo la chiave dei nostri problemi?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Volevo darle questo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Professore! Dove l'ha trovato?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Oh, si trovava in quella stazione spaziale.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: Che disdetta che non ci sia Victoria! Questo genere di ricerca è la sua passione!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: A cosa potrebbe servire?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Non ne ho idea! Ma emana una strana energia!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: Così ho usato gli scanner della nave per localizzarne altri!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: Ma soccorrere Victoria rimane la prima priorità!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Spero che stia bene...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Ma non ne ho trovati altri nei dintorni.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Forse li ha già raccolti tutti?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Uhm, dov'è il Capitano Viridian?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: C'è nessuno?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
* GENERATORE DIMENSIONALE *
[ Generazione in corso ] Stabilità massima
[ Stato ] Operativo
PRONTO _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Aha! Allora è questo che causa l'interferenza!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Chissà se posso spegnerlo?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: ATTENZIONE! Disabilitare il generatore dimensionale può causare instabilità! Vuoi davvero continuare?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Sì!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
Davvero: l'intera dimensione potrebbe collassare! Pensaci su.
Vuoi davvero continuare?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Sì!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= ATTENZIONE =-
STABILIZZATORE DIMENSIONALE DISATTIVATO

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Oh oh...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Dovrebbe apparire da un momento all'altro...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Sta bene!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Me lo sentivo che ce l'avrebbe fatta!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Quando non è tornato, abbiamo temuto il peggio...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: Ma quando ha disattivato la fonte dell'interferenza...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: Siamo riusciti a localizzarla con gli scanner della nave...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: E a teletrasportarla di nuovo a bordo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Una bella fortuna!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Grazie ragazzi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: Pare che questa dimensione cominci a destabilizzarsi, proprio come la nostra...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: Possiamo continuare a esplorarla un po' ma...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: Prima o poi, collasserà del tutto.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Difficile dire quanto tempo ci resta. Ma la nave è riparata, perciò...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: Non appena siamo pronti, possiamo tornare a casa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: E adesso, Capitano?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Troviamo un modo per salvare questa dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: E un modo per salvare anche la nostra!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: Perché la risposta è là fuori da qualche parte!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Wow, li ha trovati tutti!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: Davvero? Fantastico!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Farò alcune analisi per scoprire a cosa servono...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Quel suono... non mi piace affatto...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Di nuovo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Un attimo, ha smesso!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Allora è qui che tenevano quegli aggeggi luccicanti? Che è successo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Stavamo giochicchiando un attimo e...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: Sono improvvisamente esplosi!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Ma guarda cos'hanno fatto! È un teletrasporto?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Lo pensavo anch'io ma...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Non ne ho mai visto uno così...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Dovremmo indagare sulla cosa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Che cosa ne pensa, Capitano?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: Guardiamo dove conduce?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Oh, no! Siamo in trappola!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: Oh oh...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Uhm... E ora come ci liberiamo da qui?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Oppure... Potevamo teletrasportarci indietro verso la nave...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Wow, che cos'è questo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Si direbbe un altro laboratorio!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Diamo un'occhiata in giro!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Quanti dati di ricerca! Ci saranno di grande aiuto a casa!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Non capisco perché abbiano abbandonato questa dimensione... Avevano quasi scoperto come ripararla!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: Forse possiamo ripararla per loro? E allora torneranno?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Che laboratorio pazzesco! Questi studiosi conoscevano le tecnologie di teletrasporto molto meglio di noi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Capitano! Ha visto questo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Combinando le loro ricerche con le nostre, potremo stabilizzare la nostra dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Siamo salvi!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Guardi cosa ho trovato qui!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: È bello tosto, non reggo più di dieci secondi...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= JUKEBOX =-
I brani proseguiranno quando lasci la nave.
Raccogli gingilli per sbloccare nuovi brani!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 5 gingilli
Pushing Onwards

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 8 gingilli
Positive Force

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 10 gingilli
Presenting VVVVVV

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 12 gingilli
Potential for Anything

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 14 gingilli
Pressure Cooker

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 16 gingilli
Predestined Fate

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 18 gingilli
Popular Potpourri

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
PROSSIMO SBLOCCO: 20 gingilli
Pipe Dream

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTRO PERSONALE =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: L'evacuazione della stazione spaziale è quasi completa ormai. Noi pochi rimasti partiremo a giorni, una volta completata la ricerca.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: Tutto crolla, prima o poi. È una legge universale.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Il generatore che abbiamo installato nella dimensione polare interferisce coi nostri teletrasporti?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Ne dubito. Sarà un semplice malfunzionamento.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= REGISTRO PERSONALE =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Ahah! Questa non la capirà nessuno.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: L'altro giorno un cubo gigante con sopra la parola AVOID m'ha inseguito nei corridoi.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Le misure di sicurezza sono sempre più drastiche!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Ormai il solo modo per raggiungere il mio laboratorio privato è con il teletrasporto.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Eventuali intrusi avranno il loro bel daffare per entrarci.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: Il primo passo è stato il piano d'inversione, che ha creato una dimensione specchio oltre l'orizzonte degli eventi...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: È bastato ritoccare un paio dei nostri parametri abituali per stabilizzare un tunnel infinito!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: Il passo finale per creare uno stabilizzatore dimensionale è stato generare un ciclo di retroazione...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: Per quanto cerchiamo, non potremo mantenere lo stabilizzatore dimensionale in eterno. Il collasso è inevitabile.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Aspetta... queste coordinate non sono nemmeno in questa dimensione!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Registro personale =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: Ho dovuto rendere inaccessibile la gran parte delle nostre ricerche. Non lasceremo che cadano nelle mani sbagliate...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Appunti di ricerca =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: È ancora possibile accedere al centro di comando attraverso i filtri atmosferici principali...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: Abbiamo scoperto che la chiave per stabilizzare questa dimensione è creare una forza d'equilibrio dall'esterno!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Temo però che sarà solo un espediente temporaneo. Nel migliore dei casi.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Sto lavorando a una soluzione più permanente, ma pare che sarà troppo tardi...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?SYNTAX ERROR

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Ora che la nave è riparata, possiamo partire in qualsiasi momento!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Ma abbiamo tutti deciso di continuare a esplorare questa dimensione.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Chissà cosa troveremo?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= RADIO DI BORDO =-
[ Stato ] Trasmissione in corso

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= ATTENZIONE =-
Il Super-Gravitrone è destinato a soli fini d'intrattenimento.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Chiunque verrà sorpreso a usare il Super Gravitrone a fini educativi verrà messo in un angolo con le mani sulla testa.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Comandi di navigazione di bordo

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Errore! Errore! Impossibile isolare le coordinate dimensionali! Interferenza rilevata!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: Oh, quello l'ho già trovato.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Disattivare invincibilità e/o rallentamento prima di entrare nel Super Gravitrone.
